name: Plants vs Slimes (Floratoby)
description:
Survive against incoming slimes by using the power of PLANTS! Click the sword at the bottom to begin the wave. 

To use the plants:

RIGHT-CLICK then SCROLL: To see different plants to activate.

RIGHT-CLICK then LEFT-CLICK: To activate PLANT WEAPON.

RIGHT-CLICK then RIGHT-CLICK: To plant the sapling to grow a PLANT TOWER.

WASD to move around.

p.s NO FULLSCREEN. The game is not balanced well. Who knows what bugs might help you reach the highest wave? Good luck!
